name: reductions
jaxpr:
{ lambda ; a:f32[4]. let
    b:f32[] = reduce_sum[axes=(0,) out_sharding=None] a
    c:f32[] = reduce_sum[axes=(0,) out_sharding=None] a
    d:f32[] = div c 4.0:f32[]
    e:f32[] = add b d
    f:f32[] = reduce_max[axes=(0,)] a
    g:f32[] = add e f
    h:f32[] = reduce_min[axes=(0,)] a
    i:f32[] = sub g h
  in (i,) }
hlo:
module @jit_reductions attributes {mhlo.num_partitions = 1 : i32, mhlo.num_replicas = 1 : i32} {
  func.func public @main(%arg0: tensor<4xf32>) -> (tensor<f32> {jax.result_info = "result"}) {
    %cst = stablehlo.constant dense<0.000000e+00> : tensor<f32>
    %0 = stablehlo.reduce(%arg0 init: %cst) applies stablehlo.add across dimensions = [0] : (tensor<4xf32>, tensor<f32>) -> tensor<f32>
    %cst_0 = stablehlo.constant dense<0.000000e+00> : tensor<f32>
    %1 = stablehlo.reduce(%arg0 init: %cst_0) applies stablehlo.add across dimensions = [0] : (tensor<4xf32>, tensor<f32>) -> tensor<f32>
    %cst_1 = stablehlo.constant dense<4.000000e+00> : tensor<f32>
    %2 = stablehlo.divide %1, %cst_1 : tensor<f32>
    %3 = stablehlo.add %0, %2 : tensor<f32>
    %cst_2 = stablehlo.constant dense<0xFF800000> : tensor<f32>
    %4 = stablehlo.reduce(%arg0 init: %cst_2) applies stablehlo.maximum across dimensions = [0] : (tensor<4xf32>, tensor<f32>) -> tensor<f32>
    %5 = stablehlo.add %3, %4 : tensor<f32>
    %cst_3 = stablehlo.constant dense<0x7F800000> : tensor<f32>
    %6 = stablehlo.reduce(%arg0 init: %cst_3) applies stablehlo.minimum across dimensions = [0] : (tensor<4xf32>, tensor<f32>) -> tensor<f32>
    %7 = stablehlo.subtract %5, %6 : tensor<f32>
    return %7 : tensor<f32>
  }
}
